#Aim:Create a diagram/graphic to explain genetic interaction on transcriptome level

load packages
```{r packages}
library(ggpubr)
library(ggplot2)


```

generate data
```{r data}
genotype <- c( rep("wildtype",63), rep("variantA",41), rep("variantB",48), rep("both",32)) 
counts <- c(rnorm(63, mean=30, sd=9), rnorm(41, mean=34, sd=9), rnorm(48, mean=11, sd=6), rnorm(32, mean=31, sd=7))

data <- cbind(genotype, counts)
data <- tibble(genotype=genotype, counts=counts)

```

grafik
```{r plot, fig.height=5, fig.width=6}
p <- ggstripchart(data, x = "genotype", y = "counts",
          color = "genotype",
          palette = "jco",
          add = "mean_sd")
p

ggsave(file="~/git/figures_thesis/genetic_interaction_concept.svg", plot=p, width=6, height=5)


```
